page.title: 01CLACTON CARNIVAL
page.content:
A special feature of Clacton's entertainment feature are the many sections of Clacton's Carnival.Amongst the many attractions for young and old alike are the Firework display over Eastcliff recreation ground,the street procession,the Pantomime Horse race,{ Donkey Derby and Beer Dig.In the street procession there are lots of floats designed to represent such things as Desert Islands,Pubs and many other things.These are all escorted around by the Police around the main streets of Clacton with the various Carnival Queens and Princesses and their floats dotted about in the procession.Also the Firework display is very colourful and there is a large Fete as well with many stalls and a big bonfire.
{ }
